content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans! 

Let me start by getting oriented with the project structure:

<bash>
find /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent -type f -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" | grep -E "(package\.json|README\.md|tsconfig\.json)" | head -20
</bash>

<bash>
ls -la /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/
</bash>

<bash>
cat /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/README.md
</bash>

This will help me understand:
- The overall project architecture
- Technology stack and dependencies
- Current capabilities and structure

I'm in **read-only planning mode** - I can explore the codebase using tools like Read, Glob, Grep, and Bash (for read-only operations only), but I cannot and will not modify any files.

What requirements would you like me to analyze and design an implementation plan for?
